description: This file defines a React component named NoteView that displays the details of a note in a read-only view. It shows the note's title, creation and update timestamps, and content, with optional editing functionalities.

methods.name: NoteView({ note = null, onEdit })
methods.description: React functional component that renders note details or a placeholder when no note is selected.

ctags.name: NoteView
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NoteView({ note = null, onEdit }) {$/
